thread.title: Taylor Kinney talks wedding plans, kids with Lady Gaga
thread.title_full: Taylor Kinney talks wedding plans, kids with Lady Gaga - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Taylor Kinney talks wedding plans, kids with Lady Gaga
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo NEW YORK, Oct. 21 (UPI) -- Taylor Kinney opened up about his wedding and future children with Lady Gaga on Monday.
The 34-year-old actor discussed his plans with reporters ahead of the New York premiere of his new movie, Rock the Kasbah . Kinney and the 29-year-old singer got engaged in February, and looked the happy couple at the screening that evening.
"I told her I don't mind doing the little white chapel thing," he told Entertainment Tonight . "She wants what she wants. I want to make sure that it's right and it's what she wants ... We're going to take our time and do it right."
Kinney and Lady Gaga met on the set of the pop star's "You and I" music video in 2011. The singer modeled bridal looks for CR Fashion Book in August, and Kinney told HuffPost Live he hopes to start a family after their wedding.
"I have a bunch of brothers," he said of his three siblings. "I grew up with a big family. I want that, sure ... I want a brood, you know. I'd like to have a little soccer team and a minivan and all that stuff."
Rock the Kasbah opens in theaters Oct. 23, and Kinney also plays Lt. Kelly Severide on Chicago Fire , which airs Tuesdays at 10 p.m. ET on NBC. Lady Gaga recently debuted as Elizabeth on American Horror Story: Hotel , which broadcasts Wednesdays at 10 p.m. ET on FX.
